articles.content: For most of the past two seasons, Tony Pollard has been one of the most obvious answers to the question, "Who could be a league-winning backup running back?" The Cowboys were, for the most part, a go… [+3331 chars]

articles.author: Ian O'Connor
articles.title: Is New York Knicks coach Tom Thibodeau too tough for the toughest job in sports? - ESPN
articles.description: The notorious workaholic's dream job features a mercurial owner, a roster in need of development and a city longing for a star. What could possibly go wrong?
articles.content: IT WAS THE summer of 2000, and to New York Knicks coach Jeff Van Gundy, it felt about 104 degrees in the shade. He decided to move summer league workouts from his Westchester base to Fairfield Univer… [+19675 chars]
